headline: A Look at GE Vernova’s Valuation Following Its First International Wind Repowering Deal with Taiwan Power Company
summary: GE Vernova (NYSE:GEV) has signed its first onshore wind repower upgrade contract outside the U.S., partnering with Taiwan Power Company for 25 upgrade kits and a five-year operations agreement. This step signals expanding international ambitions. See our latest analysis for GE Vernova. News of the Taiwan Power Company deal sent GE Vernova’s share price climbing earlier this month, a sign investors are taking note of its expanding international footprint and the company’s push toward...
